price: 7. Which will neither nourish nor avail against hunger.
arabic: لَّا يُسۡمِنُ وَلَا يُغۡنِي مِن جُوعٖ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: lā yus'minu walā yugh'nī min jūʿin
